attributes.action: Remove David Tredinnick from being a member of the health and science & technology committees for his views on Astrology.
attributes.additional_details:
In a recent article on the bbc website (http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-28464009),
David Tredinnick states his belief that Astrology could be used as part of medical practice.

His view is contradictory to real science and healthcare and as such should be removed from the health and science & technology committees.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
